name: Committee on Appropriations
description: Oversees the municipal budget, financial management, and allocation of funds for various projects and services.

name: Committee on Health and Sanitation
description: Focuses on public health programs, sanitation services, and environmental health initiatives to ensure the well-being of the community.

name: Committee on Education and Culture
description: Develops policies and programs related to education, youth development, and the preservation of local cultural heritage.
column11: \"agenda\":\"Discussion on scholarship grants for indigent students\"}

name: Committee on Agriculture and Food Security
description: Aims to enhance agricultural productivity, support local farmers, and ensure food security for the municipality.
